Thanks for writing in, and I 
hear what you're saying.

1555.text:
I could be wrong about it being 
a bird - but so

1558.text:
could the evolutionists.  I'm 
saying it really doesn't

1560.text:
matter. Similar things could be 
said about modern

1563.text:
apes and humans. They are 
remarkably the same -

1566.text:
but so what? They are still 
apes, and humans are still

1569.text:
humans.  We do not see apes 
building rocket ships

1572.text:
and flying to the moon.  The 
differences are far more

1576.text:
than the structural. But the 
evolutionary camp will

1580.text:
interpret the similarity of 
structures in light of

1582.text:
evolution, we would interpret it
in light of a common

1585.text:
designer.  Notice my main point:
it's interpretation

1589.text:
within evolution, not evidence 
FOR evolution.

1594.text:
Thanks to the oh-so-many people 
who wrote in,

1597.text:
especially those of you who took
the time to write in

1599.text:
kind and complimentary comments,
I wish I could

1601.text:
read them all, but alas, we are 
out of time. I'm your

1604.text:
host, Ian Juby, thanks for 
joining me I hope you'll

1606.text:
join me again next Genesis Week.
Next week's

1608.text:
program will be a special 
episode on the age of the

1611.text:
earth - a provocative subject. 
I'll be in Ottawa this

1613.text:
weekend along with Laurence 
Tisdall, giving lectures

1616.text:
at Bethel Pentecostal Church, 
Friday Saturday and

1619.text:
Sunday - you can head on over to
the "Events" page

1622.text:
on their website for more 
details, I'll be sharing

1624.text:
some first hand research on the 
profound evidence

1627.text:
for Noah's flood on Saturday. 
Remember you can

1630.text:
send in your comments, questions
to us in a number

1632.text: of ways: you can email us at

1634.text:
comments@genesisweek.com, or you
can send us a

1637.text:
tweet @genesisweek, or you can 
head on over to

1640.text:
genesisweek.com which is our 
youtube channel, find

1643.text:
the latest show, and leave a 
comment there.  Let us

1646.text:
remember those words of warning 
from our saviour

1649.text:
and creator, the Lord Jesus 
Christ who said "I am

1652.text:
the way, the truth, and the life
- no man comes to the

1655.text:
Father but through me"  We'll 
see you next time.

1662.text:
We need your support to help 
keep this program on

1665.text:
the air. You can help by making 
a tax-deductible

1681.text:
You can also sign up for Ian's 
newsletter, detailing

1685.text:
current news and research at
